description: A React component page for submitting bug reports, including form inputs for title, description, severity, and module; uses hooks for state management; includes UI layout components like Sidebar and TopNav.

methods.name: BugReportPage
methods.description: React functional component rendering a bug report submission form with internal state management and form handling logic.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, displays confirmation message, and resets form fields.
